tags.name: actions
tags.description: | execution of some form of computation (RPC over JSON)

post.description: (BETA) Computes forecasted data points from the provided execution result and parameters.

parameters.name: resultId
parameters.description: Input result ID to be used in the computation

parameters.name: skip-cache
parameters.description: Ignore all caches during execution of current request.

post.description: (EXPERIMENTAL) Computes clusters for data points from the provided execution result and parameters.

parameters.name: resultId
parameters.description: Input result ID to be used in the computation

parameters.name: skip-cache
parameters.description: Ignore all caches during execution of current request.

parameters.name: resultId
parameters.description: Input result ID to be used in the computation

parameters.name: skip-cache
parameters.description: Ignore all caches during execution of current request.

post.description: (EXPERIMENTAL) Computes key driver analysis for the provided execution definition.

parameters.name: skip-cache
parameters.description: Ignore all caches during execution of current request.

post.description: Computes change analysis for the provided execution definition.

post.summary: Listing of label values. The resulting data are limited by the static platform limit to the maximum of 10000 rows.
post.description: Returns paged list of elements (values) of given label satisfying given filtering criteria.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Request page with this offset. Must be positive integer. The API is limited to the maximum of 10000 items. Therefore this parameter is limited to this number as well.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Return only this number of items. Must be positive integer. The API is limited to the maximum of 10000 items. Therefore this parameter is limited to this number as well.

parameters.name: skip-cache
parameters.description: Ignore all caches during execution of current request.

x-gdc-security-info.description: Permissions required to view a report or label elements.

post.description: The resource provides static structures needed for investigation of a problem with given AFM.

parameters.name: explainType
parameters.description:
Requested explain type. If not specified all types are bundled in a ZIP archive.

`MAQL` - MAQL Abstract Syntax Tree, execution dimensions and related info

`GRPC_MODEL` - Datasets used in execution

`GRPC_MODEL_SVG` - Generated SVG image of the datasets

`COMPRESSED_GRPC_MODEL_SVG` - Generated SVG image of the model fragment used in the query

`WDF` - Workspace data filters in execution workspace context

`QT` - Query Tree, created from MAQL AST using Logical Data Model,  contains all information needed to generate SQL

`QT_SVG` - Generated SVG image of the Query Tree

`OPT_QT` - Optimized Query Tree

`OPT_QT_SVG` - Generated SVG image of the Optimized Query Tree

`SQL` - Final SQL to be executed

`COMPRESSED_SQL` - Final SQL to be executed with rolled SQL datasets

`SETTINGS` - Settings used to execute explain request

schema.description: ZIP with MAQL, GRPC_MODEL, GRPC_MODEL_SVG, WDF, QT, QT_SVG, OPT_QT, OPT_QT_SVG and SQL files

post.summary: Executes analytical request and returns link to the result
post.description: AFM is a combination of attributes, measures and filters that describe a query you want to execute.

parameters.name: skip-cache
parameters.description: Ignore all caches during execution of current request.

schema.description: Timestamp for the execution. Deprecated, use `settings.timestamp` in the request body.

200.description: AFM Execution response with links to the result and server-enhanced dimensions from the original request.

X-GDC-CANCEL-TOKEN.description: A token that can be used to cancel this execution

x-gdc-security-info.description: Permissions required to view a report or label elements.

post.description: Returns list containing attributes, facts, or metrics, which can be added to given AFM while still keeping it computable.

200.description: List of attributes, facts and metrics valid with respect to given AFM.

post.description: (BETA) Returns map of lists of attributes that can be used as descendants of the given attributes.

200.description: Map of lists of attributes valid as descendants of the given attributes.

post.summary: Applies all the given cancel tokens.
post.description: Each cancel token corresponds to one unique execution request for the same result id. If all cancel tokens for the same result id are applied, the execution for this result id is cancelled.

x-gdc-security-info.description: Permissions required to view a report or label elements.

post.description: (BETA) Uses similarity (e.g. cosine distance) search to find top X most similar metadata objects.
Triggers asynchronous calculation of metadata quality issues and returns a process ID for status tracking.
(BETA) Combines multiple use cases such as search, create visualizations, ...
(BETA) Post thread ID (and optionally interaction ID) to get full/partial chat history.
(BETA) Combines multiple use cases such as search, create visualizations, ...
Validates existing LLM endpoint with provided parameters and updates it if they are valid.
Validates LLM endpoint with provided parameters.

get.summary: Get a single execution result's metadata.
get.description: The resource provides execution result's metadata as AFM and resultSpec used in execution request and an executionResponse

200.description: Execution result's metadata was found and returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Request page with these offsets. Format is offset=1,2,3,... - one offset for each dimensions in ResultSpec from originating AFM.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Return only this number of items. Format is limit=1,2,3,... - one limit for each dimensions in ResultSpec from originating AFM.

parameters.name: excludedTotalDimensions
parameters.description: Identifiers of the dimensions where grand total data should not be returned for this request. A grand total will not be returned if all of its totalDimensions are in excludedTotalDimensions.

200.description: Execution result was found and returned.

x-gdc-security-info.description: Permissions required to view a report or label elements.

get.summary: Get Active LLM Endpoints for this workspace
get.description: Returns a list of available LLM Endpoints
Returns a list of Users who created any memory item for this workspace
Returns the status of a quality issues calculation process identified by process ID.
Returns metadata quality issues detected by the platform linter.
Returns usage statistics of chat for a user in a workspace.
Returns a list of tags for this workspace
Returns a list of Users who created any object for this workspace

forecastPeriod.description: Number of future periods that should be forecasted

seasonal.description: Whether the input data is seasonal

AbsoluteDateFilter.description: A datetime filter specifying exact from and to values.

AfmIdentifier.description: Reference to the attribute label to which the filter should be applied.

AfmObjectIdentifier.description: ObjectIdentifier with `identifier` wrapper. This serves to distinguish MD object identifiers in AFM request from local identifiers.

AfmObjectIdentifierAttribute.description: Reference to the date attribute to use.

AfmObjectIdentifierCore.description: Reference to the metric, fact or attribute object to use for the metric.

AfmObjectIdentifierDataset.description: Reference to the date dataset to which the filter should be applied.

measureIdentifiers.description: List of metrics to apply arithmetic operation by chosen operator.

operator.description: Arithmetic operator describing operation between metrics.

ArithmeticMeasureDefinition.description: Metric representing arithmetics between other metrics.

AttributeFilterElements.description: Filter on specific set of label values.

granularity.description: Date granularity specifying particular date attribute in given dimension.

from.description: Start of the filtering interval. Specified by number of periods (with respect to given granularity). Typically negative (historical time interval like -2 for '2 days/weeks, ... ago'). If null, then start of the range is unbounded.

to.description: End of the filtering interval. Specified by number of periods (with respect to given granularity). Value 'O' is representing current time-interval (current day, week, ...). If null, then end of the range is unbounded.

BoundedFilter.description: Bounding filter for this relative date filter. This can be used to limit the range of the relative date filter to a specific date range.

DateFilter.description: Abstract filter definition type for dates.

FilterDefinitionForSimpleMeasure.description: Abstract filter definition type for simple metric.

InlineMeasureDefinition.description: Metric defined by the raw MAQL query.

auxMetrics.description: Additional metrics to be included in the computation, but excluded from the analysis.

localIdentifier.description: Local identifier of the metric. This can be used to reference the metric in other parts of the execution definition.

MeasureItem.description: Metric is a quantity that is calculated from the data.

NegativeAttributeFilter.description: Filter able to limit element values by label and related selected negated elements.

periodsAgo.description: Number of periods ago to calculate the previous period for.

PopDataset.description: Combination of the date data set to use and how many periods ago to calculate the previous period for.

dateDatasets.description: Specification of which date data sets to use for determining the period to calculate the previous period for.

periodsAgo.description: Number of periods ago to calculate the previous period for.

PopDate.description: Combination of the date attribute to use and how many periods ago to calculate the PoP for.

dateAttributes.description: Attributes to use for determining the period to calculate the PoP for.

PopDateMeasureDefinition.description: Period over period type of metric.

PositiveAttributeFilter.description: Filter able to limit element values by label and related selected elements.

granularity.description: Date granularity specifying particular date attribute in given dimension.

from.description: Start of the filtering interval. Specified by number of periods (with respect to given granularity). Typically negative (historical time interval like -2 for '2 days/weeks, ... ago').

to.description: End of the filtering interval. Specified by number of periods (with respect to given granularity). Value 'O' is representing current time-interval (current day, week, ...).

RelativeDateFilter.description: A date filter specifying a time interval that is relative to the current date. For example, last week, next month, and so on. Field dataset is representing qualifier of date dimension. The 'from' and 'to' properties mark the boundaries of the interval. If 'from' is omitted, all values earlier than 'to' are included. If 'to' is omitted, all values later than 'from' are included. It is not allowed to omit both.

aggregation.description: Definition of aggregation type of the metric.

computeRatio.description: If true, compute the percentage of given metric values (broken down by AFM attributes) to the total (not broken down).

filters.description: Metrics can be filtered by attribute filters with the same interface as ones for global AFM. Note that only one DateFilter is allowed.

SimpleMeasureDefinition.description: Metric defined by referencing a MAQL metric or an LDM fact object with aggregation.

timezone.description: Timezone for date formatting like 'America/New_York', 'Europe/Prague', etc.

AttributeFormat.description: Attribute format describes formatting information to effectively format attribute values when needed.

localIdentifier.description: Local identifier of the attribute. This can be used to reference the attribute in other parts of the execution definition.

showAllValues.description: Indicates whether to show all values of given attribute even if the data bound to those values is not available.

attributes.description: Attributes to analyze for significant changes. If empty, valid attributes will be automatically discovered.

useSmartAttributeSelection.description: Whether to use smart attribute selection (LLM-based) instead of discovering all valid attributes. If true, GenAI will intelligently select the most relevant attributes for change analysis. If false or not set, all valid attributes will be discovered using Calcique. Smart attribute selection applies only when no attributes are provided.

dimensionality.description: References to the attributes to be used when filtering.

treatNullValuesAs.description: A value that will be substituted for null values in the metric for the comparisons.

ComparisonMeasureValueFilter.description: Filter the result by comparing specified metric to given constant value, using given comparison operator.

InlineFilterDefinition.description: Filter in form of direct MAQL query.

MeasureValueFilter.description: Abstract filter definition type filtering by the value of the metric.

dimensionality.description: References to the attributes to be used when filtering.

treatNullValuesAs.description: A value that will be substituted for null values in the metric for the comparisons.

RangeMeasureValueFilter.description: Filter the result by comparing specified metric to given range of values.

dimensionality.description: References to the attributes to be used when filtering.

measures.description: References to the metrics to be used when filtering.

operator.description: The type of ranking to use, TOP or BOTTOM.

value.description: Number of top/bottom values to filter.

RankingFilter.description: Filter the result on top/bottom N values according to given metric(s).

primaryTitle.description: Title of primary label of attribute owning requested label, null if the title is null or the primary label is excluded

granularity.description: Granularity of requested label in case of date attribute

cacheId.description: The client can use this in subsequent requests (like paging or search) to get results from the same point in time as the previous request. This is useful when the underlying data source has caches disabled and the client wants to avoid seeing inconsistent results and to also avoid excessive queries to the database itself.

ElementsResponse.description: Entity holding list of sorted & filtered label elements, related primary label of attribute owning requested label and paging.

total.description: Count of returnable items ignoring paging.

count.description: Count of items in this page.

next.description: Link to next page, or null if this is last page.

DependsOn.description: Filter definition type specified by label and values.

label.description: Specifies on which label the filter depends on.

values.description: Specifies values of the label for element filtering.

excludePrimaryLabel.description:
Excludes items from the result that differ only by primary label
* ```false``` - return items with distinct primary label
* ```true``` - return items with distinct requested label

sortOrder.description:
Sort order of returned items.
Items are sorted by ```label``` title. If no sort order is specified then attribute's ```sortDirection``` is used, which is ASC by default

complementFilter.description:
Inverse filters:
* ```false``` - return items matching ```patternFilter``` and ```exactFilter```
* ```true``` - return items not matching ```patternFilter``` and ```exactFilter```

patternFilter.description: Return only items, whose ```label``` title case insensitively contains ```filter``` as substring.

exactFilter.description: Return only items, whose ```label``` title exactly matches one of ```filter```.

dependsOn.description: Return only items that are not filtered-out by the parent filters.

validateBy.description: Return only items that are computable on metric.

dataSamplingPercentage.description: Specifies percentage of source table data scanned during the computation. This field is deprecated and is no longer used during the elements computation.

cacheId.description: If specified, the element data will be taken from the result with the same cacheId if it is available.

labelType.description: Specifies which label is used for filtering - primary or requested.

FilterBy.description: Specifies what is used for filtering.

id.description: Specifies entity used for valid elements computation.

type.description: Specifies entity type which could be label, attribute, fact, or metric.

attributes.description: Attributes to be used in the computation.

filters.description: Various filter types to filter the execution result.

auxMeasures.description: Metrics to be referenced from other AFM objects (e.g. filters) but not included in the result.

AFM.description: Top level executable entity. Combination of [A]ttributes, [F]ilters & [M]etrics.

additionalProperties.description: Mapping from dimension items (either 'localIdentifier' from 'AttributeItem', or "measureGroup") to their respective values. This effectively specifies the path (location) of the data column used for sorting. Therefore values for all dimension items must be specified.

properties.description: Mapping from dimension items (either 'localIdentifier' from 'AttributeItem', or "measureGroup") to their respective values. This effectively specifies the path (location) of the data column used for sorting. Therefore values for all dimension items must be specified.

DataColumnLocator.description: Mapping from dimension items (either 'localIdentifier' from 'AttributeItem', or "measureGroup") to their respective values. This effectively specifies the path (location) of the data column used for sorting. Therefore values for all dimension items must be specified.

properties.description: Mapping from dimensions to data column locators.

DataColumnLocators.description: Data column locators for the values.

localIdentifier.description: Dimension identification within requests. Other entities can reference this dimension by this value.

itemIdentifiers.description: List of items in current dimension. Can reference 'localIdentifier' from 'AttributeItem', or special pseudo attribute "measureGroup" representing list of metrics.

sorting.description: List of sorting rules. From most relevant to least relevant (less relevant rule is applied, when more relevant rule compares items as equal).

dataSamplingPercentage.description: Specifies the percentage of rows from fact datasets to use during computation. This feature is available only for workspaces that use a Vertica Data Source without table views.

timestamp.description: Specifies the timestamp of the execution from which relative filters are resolved. If not set, the current time is used.

ExecutionSettings.description: Various settings affecting the process of AFM execution or its result

ResultSpec.description: Specifies how the result data will be formatted (```dimensions```) and which additional data shall be computed (```totals```).

attributeIdentifier.description: Item reference (to 'itemIdentifiers') referencing, which item should be used for sorting. Only references to attributes are allowed.

sortType.description:
Mechanism by which this attribute should be sorted. Available options are:
- DEFAULT: sorting based on default rules (using sort column if defined, otherwise this label) 
- LABEL: sorting by this label values 
- ATTRIBUTE: sorting by values of this label's attribute (or rather the primary label) 
- ATTRIBUTE: sorting by values of this label's attribute (or rather the primary label)- AREA: sorting by area (total or subtotal) corresponding to each attribute value. The area is computed by summing up all metric values in all other dimensions.

SortKeyAttribute.description: Sorting rule for sorting by attribute value in current dimension.

totalIdentifier.description: Local identifier of the total to sort by.

SortKeyTotal.description: Sorting rule for sorting by total value. DataColumnLocators are only required if there is ambiguity. Locator for measureGroup is taken from the metric of the total.

SortKeyValue.description: Sorting rule for sorting by measure value. DataColumnLocators for each dimension opposite to the sorted one must be specified.

localIdentifier.description: Total identification within this request. Used e.g. in sorting by a total.

function.description: Aggregation function to compute the total.

metric.description: The metric for which the total will be computed

Total.description: Definition of a total. There are two types of totals: grand totals and subtotals. Grand total data will be returned in a separate section of the result structure while subtotals are fully integrated into the main result data. The mechanism for this distinction is automatic and it's described in `TotalDimension`

dimensionIdentifier.description: An identifier of a dimension for which the total will be computed.

totalDimensionItems.description: List of dimension items which will be used for total computation. The total is a grand total in this dimension if the list is empty or it includes the first dimension item from the dimension definition, and its data and header will be returned in a separate `ExecutionResultGrandTotal` structure. Otherwise, it is a subtotal and the data will be integrated into the main result.

TotalDimension.description: A list of dimensions across which the total will be computed. Total headers for only these dimensions will be returned in the result.

localIdentifier.description: Local identifier of the attribute this header relates to.

granularity.description: Date granularity of the attribute, only filled for date attributes.

ExecutionResponse.description: Response to AFM execution request body

GeoAreaConfig.description: Configuration specific to geo area labels.

localIdentifier.description: Local identifier of the measure this header relates to.

format.description: Format to be used to format the measure data.

ResultDimensionHeader.description: One of the headers in a result dimension.

AfmValidObjectsQuery.description: Entity holding AFM and list of object types whose validity should be computed.

AfmValidObjectsResponse.description: All objects of specified types valid with respect to given AFM.

attributes.description: List of identifiers of the attributes to get the valid descendants for.

AfmValidDescendantsQuery.description: Entity describing the valid descendants request.

additionalProperties.description: Map of attribute identifiers to list of valid descendants identifiers.

validDescendants.description: Map of attribute identifiers to list of valid descendants identifiers.

AfmValidDescendantsResponse.description: Entity describing the valid descendants response.

objectTypes.description: List of object types to search for.

deepSearch.description: Turn on deep search. If true, content of complex objects will be searched as well, e.g. metrics in visualizations.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. There is a hard limit and the actual number of returned results may be lower than what is requested.

titleToDescriptorRatio.description: Temporary for experiments. Ratio of title score to descriptor score.

relevantScoreThreshold.description: Score, above which we return found objects. Below this score objects are not relevant.

includeHidden.description: If true, includes hidden objects in search results. If false (default), excludes objects where isHidden=true.

sourceWorkspaceId.description: Source workspace ID. If relationship is dashboard->visualization, this is the workspace where the dashboard is located.

targetWorkspaceId.description: Target workspace ID. If relationship is dashboard->visualization, this is the workspace where the visualization is located.

reasoning.description: If something is not working properly this field will contain explanation.

items.description: List of tags assigned to the object.

modifiedAt.description: Timestamp when object was last modified.

visualizationUrl.description: If the object is visualization, this field defines the type of visualization.

score.description: Result score calculated by a similarity search algorithm (cosine_distance).

scoreDescriptor.description: Result score for descriptor containing(now) description and tags.

scoreExactMatch.description: Result score for exact match(id/title). 1/1000. Other scores are multiplied by this.

isHidden.description: If true, this object is hidden from AI search results by default.

processId.description: Process ID for tracking the calculation status

ActiveObjectIdentification.description: Object, with which the user is actively working.

limitCreateContext.description: Maximum number of relevant objects included into context for LLM (for each object type).

threadIdSuffix.description: Chat History thread suffix appended to ID generated by backend. Enables more chat windows.

titleToDescriptorRatio.description: Temporary for experiments. Ratio of title score to descriptor score.

searchScoreThreshold.description: Score, above which we return found object(s) and don't call LLM to create new objects.

relevantScoreThreshold.description: Score, above which we return found objects. Below this score objects are not relevant.

includeHidden.description: If true, includes hidden objects in search and visualization building. If false (default), excludes objects where isHidden=true.

objectTypes.description: List of object types to filter the search and visualization building. If empty or null, all object types are considered.

UserContext.description: User context, which can affect the behavior of the underlying AI features.

threadIdSuffix.description: Chat History thread suffix appended to ID generated by backend. Enables more chat windows.

chatHistoryInteractionId.description: Return chat history records only after this interaction ID. If empty, complete chat history is returned.

responseState.description: Response state indicating the outcome of the AI interaction.

userTextFeedback.description: User text feedback for the interaction.

measureTitle.description: The title of the measure being analyzed

attributes.description: Attributes to analyze for significant changes

useSmartAttributeSelection.description: Whether to use smart attribute selection

threadIdSuffix.description: Chat History thread suffix appended to ID generated by backend. Enables more chat windows.

chatHistoryInteractionId.description: Chat History interaction ID. Unique ID for each interaction.

interactionFinished.description: Has the interaction already finished? Can be used for polling when interaction is in progress.

id.description: Proposed ID of the new visualization

title.description: Proposed title of the new visualization

metrics.description: List of metrics to be used in the new visualization

dimensionality.description: List of attributes representing the dimensionality of the new visualization

filters.description: List of filters to be applied to the new visualization

reasoning.description: Reasoning from LLM. Description of how and why the answer was generated.

suggestions.description: List of suggestions for next steps. Filled when no visualization was created, suggests alternatives.

DimAttribute.description: List of attributes representing the dimensionality of the new visualization

Filter.description: List of filters to be applied to the new visualization

objects.description: List of objects found with a similarity search.

reasoning.description: Reasoning from LLM. Description of how and why the answer was generated.

FoundObjects.description: List of objects found by similarity search and post-processed by LLM.

aggFunction.description: Agg function. Empty if a stored metric is used.

Metric.description: List of metrics to be used in the new visualization

useCase.description: Use case where LLM routed based on question.

reasoning.description: Explanation why LLM picked this use case.

RouteResult.description: Question -> Use Case routing. May contain final answer is a special use case is not required.

Suggestion.description: List of suggestions for next steps. Filled when no visualization was created, suggests alternatives.

threadIdSuffix.description: Chat History thread suffix appended to ID generated by backend. Enables more chat windows.

chatHistoryInteractionId.description: Chat History interaction ID. Unique ID for each interaction.

provider.description: Provider for the LLM endpoint validation

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the LLM endpoint validation

token.description: Token for the LLM endpoint validation

llmOrganization.description: Organization name for the LLM endpoint validation

llmModel.description: LLM model for the LLM endpoint validation

successful.description: Whether the LLM endpoint validation was successful

message.description: Additional message about the LLM endpoint validation

provider.description: Provider for the LLM endpoint validation

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the LLM endpoint validation

token.description: Token for the LLM endpoint validation

llmOrganization.description: Organization name for the LLM endpoint validation

llmModel.description: LLM model for the LLM endpoint validation

data.description: The change analysis result data containing significant changes.

ChangeAnalysisResult.description: Result of a change analysis execution.

attributeName.description: The name of the attribute being analyzed

attributeValue.description: The value of the attribute being analyzed

metricValueInAnalyzedPeriod.description: The metric value in the analyzed period

metricValueInReferencePeriod.description: The metric value in the reference period

metricValueDelta.description: The delta between analyzed and reference periods

metricValueDeltaAbs.description: The absolute delta between analyzed and reference periods

attributeValuesChangeMean.description: The mean of attribute value changes for the attribute being analyzed

attributeValuesChangeStd.description: The standard deviation of attribute value changes for the attribute being analyzed

isSignificantChange.description: Whether the change is statistically significant

overallMetricValueInAnalyzedPeriod.description: The overall metric value in the analyzed period

overallMetricValueInReferencePeriod.description: The overall metric value in the reference period

ResultCacheMetadata.description: All execution result's metadata used for calculation including ExecutionResponse

labelValue.description: A value of the current attribute label.

primaryLabelValue.description: A value of the primary attribute label.

AttributeResultHeader.description: Header containing the information related to attributes.

data.description: A multi-dimensional array of computed results. The most common one being a 2-dimensional array. The arrays can be composed of Double or null values.

dimensionHeaders.description: An array containing dimension headers. The size of the array corresponds to the number of dimensions. Their order corresponds to the dimension order in the execution result spec.

ExecutionResult.description: Contains the result of an AFM execution.

correlationId.description: Id correlating different pieces of supplementary info together.

source.description: Information about what part of the system created this piece of supplementary info.

type.description: Type of the supplementary info instance. There are currently no well-known values for this, but there might be some in the future.

data.description: Data of this particular supplementary info item: a free-form JSON specific to the particular supplementary info item type.

ExecutionResultDataSourceMessage.description: A piece of extra information related to the results (e.g. debug information, warnings, etc.).

data.description: A multi-dimensional array of computed results. The most common one being a 2-dimensional array. The arrays can be composed of Double or null values.

dimensionHeaders.description: Contains headers for a subset of `totalDimensions` in which the totals are grand totals.

ExecutionResultGrandTotal.description: Contains the data of grand totals with the same dimensions.

dataSourceMessages.description: Additional information sent by the underlying data source.

ExecutionResultMetadata.description: Additional metadata for the particular execution result.

count.description: A count of the returned results in every dimension.

offset.description: The offset of the results returned in every dimension.

total.description: A total count of the results in every dimension.

ExecutionResultPaging.description: A paging information related to the data presented in the execution result. These paging information are multi-dimensional.

HeaderGroup.description: Contains the information specific for a group of headers. These groups correlate to attributes and metric groups.

MeasureResultHeader.description: Header containing the information related to metrics.

TotalResultHeader.description: Header containing the information related to a subtotal.

userId.description: User ID of the user who created memory item

firstname.description: First name of the user who created memory item

lastname.description: Last name of the user who created memory item

id.description: Unique identifier for the quality issue

objects.description: List of objects affected by this quality issue

additionalProperties.description: Detailed information about the quality issue

detail.description: Detailed information about the quality issue

QualityIssue.description: List of quality issues (available when status is COMPLETED)

workspaceId.description: Workspace ID where the object belongs

QualityIssueObject.description: List of objects affected by this quality issue

issues.description: List of quality issues (available when status is COMPLETED)

error.description: Error message (available when status is FAILED or NOT_FOUND)

issues.description: List of quality issues found in the workspace

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the quality issues were last updated (ISO format)

status.description: Status of the latest triggered quality check process

interactionCount.description: Number of interactions in the time window

interactionLimit.description: Maximum number of interactions in the time window any user can do in the workspace

items.description: Tags assigned to any object in the catalog

users.description: Users who created any object in the catalog

userId.description: User ID of the user who created any objects

firstname.description: First name of the user who created any objects

lastname.description: Last name of the user who created any objects

AnalyticsCatalogUser.description: Users who created any object in the catalog
